Comment.Text: TODO: stopListeningToSystemSignals (or otherwise do not start listening to system signals after obtaining of Signal.shutDown)

Commands.Command: SituationEnum SE = { startIntroduction = "startIntroduction" , startClosing = "startClosing" , startSorting = "startSorting" , startQuiz = "startQuiz" , gameTurn = "gameTurn" , switchRole = "switchRole" , turnFinished = "turnFinished" , gameFinished = "gameFinished" , stopPlaying = "stopPlaying" };
DialogueAct da = { type = "express" , subtype = "success" , value = lastReaction.value };
DialogueAct da = { type = "acknowledgement" , subtype = "correctness" , value = lastReaction.value };

Comment.Text: If in the start node waitFor="fun", you get a final "did you have fun" dialogue.

Commands.Command: return = { type = "acknowledgement" , subtype = waitFor , value = lastReaction.value , LastTime = lastTime }; emitDialogueAct ( return );
sysCall ( "expectDAs" , "request\(play|stop\)" ); emitDialogueAct ( { type = "request" , subtype = "play" , what = gameToPropose ( ) } );

Comment.Text: Answer not correct, should we retry?

Commands.Command: lastReaction = { type = "provide" , subtype = "question" , id = "-1" , answersProvided = true };

Comment.Text: Changed so performance is never given for the last version of dutch quiz

Commands.Command: emitDialogueAct ( { type = "accept" , subtype = "role" , asker = asker } ); emitDialogueAct ( { type = "provide" , subtype = "instructions" , asker = asker } );
DialogueAct da = { type = "provide" , subtype = "performance" , total = 0 , correct = 0 , asker = asker };
roleChanged = ! roleChanged; emitDialogueAct ( { type = "provide" , subtype = "role" , asker = asker } );

Comment.Text: This is the original starting node, changed for the last version of dutch quiz, for dutch version, put edge to n56 (no continuation question)
total and correct are the questions where the user was answering. The parameter specifies the ASKER!
Changed so always given for dutch quiz.

Commands.Command: DialogueAct da = { type = "provide" , subtype = "performanceSession" , total = 0 , correct = 0 , totalRobot = 0 , correctRobot = 0 };
DialogueAct return = { type = "" , subtype = "" }; DialogueAct result = emptyReaction ( );

Comment.Text: Welcomes child and asks for information ie age, hobby
Test if response is to the questions asked
If started say "hello" and comment on eyecolor if available
Wait here until input is given

SuperNode.name: TestForRightAnswerTest if response is to the question asked

Commands.Command: return = { type = "acknowledgement" , subtype = askFor }; emitDialogueAct ( return );

Comment.Text: Test if any parameter is given - no => select random of the possibilities - yes => test if one of the possible parameters is given
